segments.text: Come in and sit down , Jack . Now , what's the trouble ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got a terrible pain in my stomach , Doctor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . When did it start ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It started yesterday . I didn't eat any supper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so . I feel very hot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's see . Yes . You ' Ve got quite a high temperature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got an awful headache , too , and my throat hurts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hm .. I think you ' Ve got the flu .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not at all , but you must stay in bed for three days and take this medicine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How often must I take it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Three times a day after meals .
segments.speaker: S1
